ValidationRule.description: B12 - if 8 1/2 x 11 Binding Options value = 1” Binder, then the Binder Cover Option AND Binder Quantity Fields must NOT be Null
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ($RecordType.Name = "Handbook HR Solutions Order Record Type" ), (ISPICKVAL(X8_x_11_Options__c, '1” Binder')), (( ISPICKVAL(Art__c, '')) || (Binder_Quantity__c = 0) || (ISNULL(Binder_Quantity__c)) ), (Historical_Order_Indicator__c = 0), (NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"HR Essentials"))), (NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator"))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must select a Binder Cover Option AND a Binder Quantity greater than zero when selecting the 8 ½ x 11 Binding Options value of '1" binder'.
